title: Lost Research Station Adventure #30
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Main Control Room
rooms.description: A dimly lit control room with flickering monitors displaying critical system warnings. Emergency lights cast an eerie red glow across banks of computers and control panels. Coffee cups and scattered papers suggest a hasty evacuation. The air is cold and stale, and a faint alarm beeps rhythmically in the distance. Through the viewport, you see the endless void of space.

items.name: main control console
items.description: The primary control station with multiple screens showing system diagnostics and station status
items.text: SYSTEM STATUS: Station Alpha-7 established 2089. Life support: CRITICAL. Crew evacuation initiated. Chief Scientist: Dr. Elena Vasquez. Lead Engineer: Marcus Chen. Emergency protocols require authorization from senior staff.

items.name: operations desk
items.description: A cluttered desk with three drawers and various documents scattered across the surface

items.name: station log datapad
items.description: A digital tablet with the station's operational log
items.text: STATION LOG - Day 847: Research Station Alpha-7 commissioned in 2089. Dr. Vasquez's quantum experiments in the laboratory are showing promising results. Engineer Chen maintains all systems. The combination to secure storage is our founding year.

items.name: security access keycard
items.description: A magnetic keycard labeled 'LABORATORY ACCESS - AUTHORIZED PERSONNEL'

items.name: emergency supply locker
items.description: A metal locker containing emergency supplies and equipment

items.name: emergency flashlight
items.description: A heavy-duty flashlight for navigating dark areas

items.name: emergency procedures manual
items.description: A handbook outlining station emergency protocols
items.text: EMERGENCY EVACUATION: In case of critical system failure, proceed to escape pod bay. Access requires senior staff authorization. Chief Scientist oversees all research. Laboratory is the primary research facility. Engineer maintains life support systems.

items.name: status monitor
items.description: A large wall-mounted screen displaying station information
items.text: STATION ALPHA-7 STATUS: Oxygen levels declining. Evacuation recommended. All personnel report to escape pod bay. Research data secured in laboratory vault.

items.name: laboratory access door
items.description: A reinforced door with a card reader and biometric scanner, leading to the research laboratory

rooms.name: Research Laboratory
rooms.description: A state-of-the-art laboratory filled with sophisticated equipment and experimental apparatus. Holographic displays show complex quantum equations floating in mid-air. Specimen containers line the walls, and a large vault dominates one corner. The lab is in disarray, with overturned chairs and scattered research notes suggesting a rushed departure.

items.name: research terminal
items.description: Dr. Vasquez's personal workstation with multiple screens and data storage
items.text: DR. VASQUEZ'S TERMINAL: Quantum research breakthrough achieved! Data stored in secure vault. Access code is my employee number: 4472. The escape pod bay requires knowledge of station leadership and research focus.

items.name: laboratory workbench
items.description: A long bench covered with scientific instruments and research materials

items.name: research journal
items.description: Dr. Vasquez's handwritten research journal
items.text: Research Journal - Dr. Elena Vasquez: My quantum experiments are the primary focus of this station. Marcus keeps everything running smoothly. If evacuation is necessary, the escape pod bay is our only option. Remember: I'm the Chief Scientist, quantum research is our mission.

items.name: equipment storage cabinet
items.description: A tall cabinet with compartments for laboratory equipment

items.name: personnel roster
items.description: A document listing all station personnel and their roles
items.text: STATION ALPHA-7 PERSONNEL: Dr. Elena Vasquez - Chief Scientist (ID: 4472), Marcus Chen - Lead Engineer (ID: 3381), Dr. Sarah Kim - Research Assistant (ID: 5529). Primary research focus: Quantum mechanics and particle physics.

items.name: secure research vault
items.description: A heavy vault with a digital combination lock, containing sensitive research data

items.name: escape pod bay key
items.description: A physical key labeled 'ESCAPE POD BAY - EMERGENCY USE ONLY'

items.name: final research report
items.description: Dr. Vasquez's final report before evacuation
items.text: FINAL REPORT: Station systems failing. Quantum research complete. All personnel must evacuate via escape pod bay. Security protocol requires verification: Who leads the science team? What is our research focus? Where do we evacuate to?

items.name: specimen storage containers
items.description: Rows of sealed containers with various experimental samples

items.name: escape pod bay door
items.description: A massive airlock door leading to the escape pod bay. A security terminal displays three verification questions that must be answered correctly.

password_questions.question: Who is the Chief Scientist?
password_questions.hint: Check the main console, personnel roster, and research notes

password_questions.question: What is the primary research focus?
password_questions.hint: Read Dr. Vasquez's research journal and the personnel roster

password_questions.question: Where do personnel evacuate to?
password_questions.hint: The emergency manual and final report mention the evacuation location

rooms.name: Escape Pod Bay
rooms.description: You've reached the escape pod bay! A sleek emergency escape pod sits in its launch cradle, its systems humming with power and ready for immediate departure. Through the transparent canopy, you can see the control panel glowing green with 'SYSTEMS READY' displayed. The launch tube extends into space beyond. Safety lights illuminate the path to survival.

items.name: emergency escape pod
items.description: A compact spacecraft designed for emergency evacuation, fully fueled and operational

items.name: launch control panel
items.description: The pod's control system showing all green status indicators and ready for launch

items.name: emergency safety equipment
items.description: Survival gear and supplies stored in the pod bay

rooms.win_message: SUCCESS! You board the escape pod and initiate the launch sequence. The pod detaches from the failing research station and rockets away into space. Through the viewport, you watch Station Alpha-7 grow smaller as you set course for the nearest safe harbor. You've solved the puzzles, survived the crisis, and escaped the lost research station. You win!
